meta.description: Interface for terminal emulators such as screen and xterm to record user sessions to utmp and wtmp files

license.fullName: GNU Library General Public License v2.1 or later

meta.long_description:
The bundled utempter binary must be able to run as a user belonging to group utmp.
On NixOS systems, this can be achieved by creating a setguid wrapper.
meta.name: libutempter
